~~~
package lecture20181223;

public class Lecture01 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		//double a = 3.14;
		/*
		정수형
		byte
		short
		int
		long

		실수형
		double
		float
		*/

		/*
		int a = 10;
		int b = 20;
		int c = a + b;
		System.out.print(c);
		 */

		/*
		문제1.
		int a = 10;
		int b = 20;
		System.out.print(a+b);
		System.out.print(a*b);
		System.out.print(a/b);
		System.out.print(a%b);
		*/

		//문제2.
		int a = 5000;
		int b = 2000;
		int c = 1500;
		System.out.print(a*2+b);



	}

}
~~~
